Articles.Content:
First time I seen the Oscar-B fuel tank, I thought of the hot dogs, hence the title.

The challenge? See if you can get to the island with the landing strip on it, and back, using the Oscar-B fuel tank as the only fuel source. And post what fuel you have remaining.

Guidelines? You may only drive on the flight lines, no exploiting the control surface trick, no RCS thrusters, no Alt + F12 cheating, and only use non-mod parts. Strictly a vanilla craft challenge.

Ok, I have to modify the challenge, and make it more difficult. Got to the island runway and back, and only used 0.18 fuel. : \

I wonder if it's possible to land on the Island in the center of that meteor crater on the other side of the planet and fly back, on an Oscar-B fuel tank. If so, That is my update to the challenge.

And how do you put pictures on here? *not a usual to forums, of any sort*

Have you tried this? Challenge Guidelines, 2nd heading..

I'm interested if it is, indeed possible.

Cheers!

- Yar
